original_text: But now I say to you: A man must not send his wife away and marry another woman. If he does that, it is the same as if he had sex with another man's wife. A man may only send his wife away if she has had sex with another man.’
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 말하노니 누구든지 음행한 이유 외에 아내를 버리고 다른 데 장가 드는 자는 간음함이니라

sentences.original_text: But now I say to you:
A man must not send his wife away
if he had sex with another man's wife.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 남자의 아내와 성관계를 갖는 것과 같다.

sentences.original_text: A man may only send his wife away
sentences.korean_translation: 남자는 아내를 내보낼 수 있는 경우는

sentences.original_text: if she has had sex with another man.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 다른 남자와 성관계를 했을 때뿐이다.'
